author: henridf
content: The nimbus-ethereumjs-1 pair has been stuck for a while. The CL seems to be doing ok and in sync, but each newPayload request gets a `payloadStatus=SYNCING` back from the EL. I took a look at the ethereumjs logs but didn't see anything obviously out of whack. Could someone from the ethjs team take a look?

author: g11tech
content: ethereumjs beacon sync has a slight bug being fixed here: https://github.com/ethereumjs/ethereumjs-monorepo/pull/2730, there is however a hack to resolve so i will try it on the pair

author: g11tech
content: seems resolved and the pair should be functional now

author: roberto.bayardo
content: seems our devnet-5 goals have been met?

author: barnabasbusa
content: Maybe nimbus can figure out attestations/proposals still? Other than that I donâ€™t think we have anything else left. Would you guys wanna keep it around till devnet 6 launches?

author: henridf
content: proposals are 1-2 weeks off, not sure if devnet-6 needs to wait for that or if we can add validators in a second step post devnet-6 launch
